        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magic Superglue Demo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magische Superglue Demo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démo Magique de Superglue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Programa demostrativo Mágico De Superglue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Demo Magico Di Superglue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγική επίδειξη Superglue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Versión parcial de programa Mágica De Superglue</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Glue a beaker to a board by putting the endothermic glue inside the beaker. (0:57 min)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kleben Sie einen Becher zu einem Brett, indem Sie 
den endothermischen Kleber innerhalb des Bechers setzen. (0:57 
Minute)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collez un becher à un panneau en mettant la colle
endothermique à l'intérieur du becher. (0:57 minute)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cole uma taça a uma placa pondo a colagem 
endothermic dentro da taça. (0:57 minuto)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Incolli una coppa ad un bordo mettendo la 
colla endotermica all'interno della coppa. (0:57 minuto)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κολλήστε μια κούπα σε έναν πίνακα με την τοποθέτηση 
της ενδοθερμικής κόλλας μέσα στην κούπα. (0:57 λ.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pegue un cubilete a una tarjeta poniendo el 
pegamento endotérmico dentro del cubilete. (0:57 minuto)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
